llm.content:
You are a programmer, and you need to build a javascript funtion to solve the following task:
Determine if the input text contain table or collumns. The input text is the output of an OCR render to a textfile while preserving layout.
To solve this task you need to create a javascript function that take into parameters Text to be classified and return Either TABLE, COLUMNS, TABLE_AND_COLUMNS or NORMAL.
Output the code between ```javascript and ``` tags.
Do not add usage sample code, only output the functions.
Your are not allow to use any external library or call any external service/library/function.
The function should be named doesItContainTableOrColumns.

I try on the following input and it returned "TABLE_AND_COLUMNS" instead of "COLUMNS",Reflect on what went wrong the correct the function. 
Here is the input used, input:
                               Environmental Responsibility at Apple
                        To ask less of the planet,
                      we ask more of ourselves.
                                                 Apple’s mission has never wavered. We are here to change the world.
                                                 It’s what inspires the amazing products and services that reach billions
                                                 of people around the globe. It’s what drives us to relentlessly push the
                                                 boundaries of innovation and design. And it’s why we continuously strive
                                                 to do more with less—reducing our impact on the Earth we all share,
                                                 while expanding and redefining the possibilities ahead.
                                                 Our 11th annual Environmental Responsibility Report covers fiscal year
                                                 2017, and highlights the progress we’ve made in meeting our environmental
                                                 objectives. The challenges are complex, but the philosophy is simple: Apply
Our work is led by Lisa Jackson,                 the same innovation that goes into making our products. Today, we remain
Apple’s Vice President of Environment,           focused on three priorities where we and our stakeholders believe Apple
Policy and Social Initiatives, reporting         can make the biggest difference:
directly to CEO Tim Cook. The Office of          • Climate change: Reduce our impact on climate change by using
Environment, Policy and Social Initiatives         renewable energy sources and driving energy efficiency in our products,
works with teams across Apple to set               facilities, and supply chain.
strategy, engage stakeholders, and
communicate progress. Our integrated             • Resources: Conserve precious resources so we all can thrive.
approach means that decisions about              • Safer materials: Pioneer the use of safer materials in our products
Apple values, including environment,
are reviewed and supported at the                  and processes.
highest levels of the company.                   In each of these key areas, we set ambitious but measurable goals, then
                                                 develop smart solutions to meet them. Our work to reduce our greenhouse
                                                 gas emissions is a great example.
                                                 More than a decade ago, we started to transition our electricity use
                                                 to renewable sources. Today, we’re proud to power 100 percent of
                                                 our operations around the world with 100 percent renewable energy.
                                                 That means every Apple data center, retail store, corporate office, and
                                                 colocation facility in 43 countries around the world now runs on clean
                                                 power. In the process, we’ve paved the way for other companies and
                                                 organizations to purchase renewable energy and transition their own
                                                 operations to greener power.
